channel.title: RuneScape - Officially Dead
channel.description:
I logged on because I have recently grown tired of RSPS and wanted to maybe bot a few days and sell some gold for some fast money. This is where I lost faith.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/1kUxzrI.png[/img]

item.title: RuneScape - Officially Dead
item.dc:creator: @Chronikk_HD Chronikk_HD
item.description:
@Chronikk_HD wrote:

I don’t think the game is exactly DEAD, just not many people play anymore.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape - Officially Dead
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

Not really a step back when it’s already been ingame for over a year. With the player count dropping, there’s only so many people who wanted this cosmetic shit and they’ve had time to get it for over a year without knowing it would be combined with the loyalty store. It’s actually another back stab from Jagex.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape - Officially Dead
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

I still wouldn’t consider having 50k+ players on daily being dead though.

They are taking a step back on RWT for in-game items with the new Loyalty shop and Solomon’s store.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape - Officially Dead
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

It’s not that I don’t like RS3, it’s pretty cool. I just lost interest in the game itself, i’m sure if I was new to playing RS and didn’t know what it was like a few years ago i’d love it.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Travas Travas
item.description:
@Travas wrote:

[quote=“Coldmedicine, post:33, topic:479581”]-Cough- GETADBLOCKYOUNOOBS -cough-

damn im getting sick[/quote]yeah gonorrhea tends to do that

Like someone said already, if people actually sat down to re-learn the game then they would probably like it. I’ve recently got back into the game and, while it’s a totally different game, I kinda like it.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape - Officially Dead
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

TIL something RS cant control at all except complain about (the ads adsense or whatever shows) at all correlates to how well the site is doing

If you saw a DOTA adsense ad on LoL would that mean that league was dead? No, it means dota paid for advertising and the ad company is going to get a lot of complains from riot about it and have to change their formulas to determine which ads to show on that site.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape - Officially Dead
item.dc:creator: @N_A_W_R_A_S N A W R A S
item.description:
@N_A_W_R_A_S wrote:

Either this image is fake or not… The game is really dead.
It won’t survive unless Jagex brings new audience AND STOP DOING STUPID USELESS UPDATES AND CONSTANTLY TELLING PEOPLE TO PAY FOR STUPID THINGS OTHER THAN THE ACTUAL MEMBERSHIP.
Because if they got a good new audience, they have to do good and useful updates, not daily updating SOF and these things… Otherwise Jagex will end up with more quitted players.

I tried to shorten what’s in my mind but I couldn’t lol

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape - Officially Dead
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

I don’t think it’s a matter of disliking it. After a few years of playing, you’ve done everything and with the shitty updates monthly, why bother.
You then add on all the big changes which never get “finished” and because it’s game changing, people leave.

I don’t regret playing but that’s because the majority of my time playing is from 06-11.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape - Officially Dead
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Tutorial:

Dedicated players are most likely still playing, and I highly doubt those that have quit take any regret against the game. It’s true, people do not like evolution, or any change for that matter, simply because it feels weird, but I’m sure people would enjoy it more if they sat down and got used to it.

This is true.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape - Officially Dead
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial

Strucker:

it’s been dead for so long…

item.title: RuneScape - Officially Dead
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

-Nothing:

I can see the future, It seems like the same thing is happening to RS2 that happened to RSC back when it closed. People get frustrated and start signing petitions in hope of Jagex opening up a RS2 2006 server. 5 years later Jagex realizes their mistake and opens up 2006 server when nobody cares anymore.

Holy fuck, I did see the future.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape - Officially Dead
item.dc:creator: @DaGamerChild DaGamerChild
item.description:
@DaGamerChild wrote:

They need to make - though it will never happen - a seperate RuneScape, like RuneScape that was in 2006, 2007, and 2008. Most older players don’t want the newer graphics or updated features. They draw in new players while getting rid of the old ones, therefore not increasing poplarity at all. I haven’t checked in a while but it used to be 140k online at a time. Now it’s just around 80k. (IMO, like on ProjectRS06, they spoof the numbers.)

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape - Officially Dead
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

I’m not saying that there are more players now then their was before, I’m saying consider RuneScape now, it is well advertised, so people will get curious and play it.

Plus, not all people from 06 and such quit, they are still loyal to the game.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape - Officially Dead
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

runescape sucks:

You have to realize that not everyone that plays RuneScape currently played it before EoC, or in 2006 or anything of the sorts, so they do not have an opinion of bringing back old RuneScape, so that makes up a huge number.

The majority of players are before the EoC. You really think this piece of crap has brought tons of players in? I honestly doubt that.

Read full topic
